Restricated Area

Please select your trekking route as your desire
Upper Mustang Trek
t present Mustang is a very popular trekking region in Nepal . The Home Ministry of Nepal announced the Opening of the restricted areas in October 1991.

[+Read more]
Lo-Manthang Trek
Mustang, "The Forbidden Kingdom" is situated north of the Himalayas and juts out onto the Tibetan Plateau.

[+Read more]
Upper Dolpa Trek
Dolpa is a most remote and least developed district in Nepal . Although a few anthropologists and geographers had explored the region, the entire district was closed to trekers until

[+Read more]
Lower Dolpa Trek
Dolpo is located inside the Shy – Phoksundo National Park of mid–western Nepal , behind the Dhaulagiri massif, towards the Tibetan Plateau.

[+Read more]
Manaslu Round Trek
Pristine mountain views, rich culture and genuine adventure sum up the trek experience to the base of Mt. Manasalu . Opened in 1992, this area offers a combination of rich

[+Read more]
Rolwaling Trek
Rolwaling meaning ‘the furrow left by the plough’ is a quiet mountain and steep-walled valley as its name suggest.

[+Read more]
